impact-statement: The structure of the photosystem I (PSI) complex from <italic>Synechocystis</italic> is determined, and reaction center subunits engineered to resemble a viral PSI are found to promote promiscuous electron acceptor properties.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
